que.htext: Do you routinely ask clients about their tobacco use?

opt.heading: Excellent. You may be interested in these
Find out why asking your clients about their tobacco use is crucial to safeguarding their health-

que.htext: Is tobacco dependence something you feel competent to treat effectively?

opt.heading: Familiarize yourself with these brief screening tools and various resources to improve your competence-

que.htext: Have you received any training on tobacco cessation?

qgrp.qtext: If no, do you anticipate receiving any training?

opt.heading: We highly recommend you familiarize yourself with these basic screening tools-

que.htext: Are you currently providing tobacco cessation treatment to any of your clients?

opt.heading: Familiarize yourself with these brief screening tools and various resources to improve your competence-
Please indicate which tobacco dependence protocols you have used -

que.htext: Do you follow up with your clients on their tobacco use?

opt.qtext: Excellent. Keep monitoring your clients’ use of tobacco.

opt.heading: Monitoring your client’s progress can prevent relapse.-
opt.qtext: Should relapse have occurred, use the 5R’s protocol
Discuss and reinforce what helps your client to remain abstinent from tobacco

que.htext: Do you refer your clients for tobacco cessation treatment?

opt.heading: Make sure to screen your clients.-
opt.qtext: Refer your clients to these quitlines
Refer your clients to other practitioners who treat tobacco dependence

que.htext: Do you plan on integrating tobacco cessation as a treatment goal?

opt.heading: Excellent.
opt.qtext: Here are more tobacco cessation resources

opt.heading: Is it because you need more reimbursement information? –
opt.qtext: You can find resources to assist with your reimbursement here

opt.heading: Is it due to lack of need among your clients? –
opt.qtext: Learn about the impact of tobacco use on various health priority populations

opt.heading: Is it too difficult to get started? – Get started with this basic screening tools.-
